title: A blood moon is coming: 1 month until a total lunar eclipse takes to the skies over North America
description: The moon will take on a dramatic blood red hue during the total lunar eclipse on March 3.
content: The moon will take on a dramatic blood red hue during the total lunar eclipse on March 3.
